name: Kabin (MurderCrowGames)
description:
find the ghostly shadow man to hear the story behind what happened.

find the cabin.

repeat the cycle twice.

break the cycle.

2 endings: False Ending & True Ending

4 maps

4 voice acted lines

Note: When You Reach An Ending The Game Closes On Its Own.

Note: when approaching the Ghostly shadow man. get close to him and wait a few seconds for the voice line to play.

Note: Depending on your pc you may not be able to play the game with shadows

Controls:

wasd or arrow keys: to move player

mouse: to move camera

space: to jump

esc: to quit game

r: to reset level

Customer Support Email: murdercrowgamesstudio@gmail.com
